snippet: Mr. Vidal was an elegant, acerbic all-around man of letters who presided with a certain relish over what he declared to be the end of American civilization.
abstract: Gore Vidal, the elegant, acerbic all-around man of letters who presided with a certain relish over what he declared to be the end of American civilization, dies at age 86.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Vidal was an elegant, acerbic all-around man of letters who presided with a certain relish over what he declared to be the end of American civilization.

headline.seo: Gore Vidal, Elegant Writer, Dies at 86
headline.main: Gore Vidal Dies at 86; Prolific, Elegant, Acerbic Writer
